name: Crobat
author: Satoshi Shirai
flavor_text: It flies so silently through the dark on its four wings that it may not be noticed even when nearby.

abilities.name: Surprise Bite
abilities.effect: When you play this Pokémon from your hand to evolve 1 of your Pokémon, you may put 3 damage counters on 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon.

attacks.name: Skill Dive
attacks.effect: This attack does 30 damage to 1 of your opponent’s Pokémon. (Don’t apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokémon.)
